name: social_extended_response_test1
title: Social Studies Extended Response Test 2
intro_text:
Social Studies

Welcome to the Social Studies Extended Response Test.

You have 25 minutes to complete the Extended Response essay.

The goal is to give you practice on the types of questions you will see on the GED® test and to give you a study plan for what you need to brush up on for the test.

The Extended Response essay will be evaluated on following two areas:

  1. How well the essay evaluates the arguments in the passages and then creates a logical argument that uses good supporting evidence.
  2. How well the essay logically develops ideas with relevant ideas and how well it is organized to communicate your message and purpose.

Your Extended Response will be scored by our staff of teachers within 72 hours.
